description: This Java class defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, which provides basic endpoints for root redirect, API documentation, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation, and redirects.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Redirects from root URL to Swagger UI.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns application information, specifically that it's a Spring Boot app called notesappbackend.
